snippet: The Obama administration announced a new initiative that would make refinancing less expensive for certain borrowers with mortgages through the Federal Housing Administration.
abstract: The Obama administration announced a new initiative that would make refinancing less expensive for certain borrowers with mortgages through the Federal Housing Administration.

headline.main: Refinancing Fees Are Reduced for Some F.H.A. Borrowers
headline.print_headline: Obama, Acting Without Congress, Reduces Some F.H.A. Refinancing Fees
